short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically create simple step-by-step guide with screenshots. Save up 20+ hours/month vs. video and text guides.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically create step-by-step training guides & documentations with screenshots by recording your browser-based workflows.

Guide HQ creates step-by-step documentation off the actions you take on your browser. This allows you to document and share you knowledge on how to use any piece of software, or how to perform certain tasks without the stress of manually taking screenshots and labelling.


You can edit, and share the workflow with your team member, or end user.
